posts.post_content:
Christmas Sale! See my other listings. Help a brother out as all proceeds got to feed hungry children......MINE!

This is a t206 Deacon Phillippe graded PSA 2. I am selling it only because I have a t205 of him that I prefer.

The card presents much better than a 2 and I spent the last minute trying to figure out why it was a 2. The corners show some wear and the back is o/c. I knew it must have a crease and I finally found it. It can be seen on the back going through the b and a in baseball, the 3 in 350 and the S in subjects. Honest to goodness I had to search for it by turning the card angles and it cannot be seen from the front. If I can't get $40 for it I will keep it.

Free shipping and MERRY CHRISTMAS!
